tours.title: 7-Day Murchison Falls, Chimps & Gorilla Trekking
tours.description: You Visit: Entebbe (Start), Ziwa Rhino Ranch, Murchison Falls NP, Kibale NP (Chimps), Queen Elizabeth NP, Bwindi Impenetrable NP (Gorillas), Entebbe Airport (End)

tours.title: 8 Days Uganda Wildlife & Gorilla Safari
tours.description: You Visit: Entebbe (Start), Murchison Falls NP, Kibale Forest NP (Chimps), Queen Elizabeth NP, Bwindi Impenetrable NP (Gorillas), Entebbe (End)

tours.title: 3 Days Gorilla Trekking Safari in Bwindi
tours.description: You Visit: Kigali (Start), Bwindi Impenetrable Forest (Gorillas), Kigali (End)

tours.title: 10 Days Uganda Primates & Wildlife Safari
tours.description: You Visit: Entebbe (Start), Kibale Forest (Chimps), Queen Elizabeth NP, Bwindi Impenetrable NP (Gorillas), Lake Mburo NP, Entebbe (End)

tours.title: 5 Days Gorilla & Chimpanzee Trekking in Uganda
tours.description: You Visit: Entebbe (Start), Kibale Forest NP (Chimps), Queen Elizabeth NP, Bwindi Impenetrable Forest (Gorillas), Entebbe (End)

tours.title: 9 Days Uganda Gorilla & Wildlife Safari
tours.description: You Visit: Entebbe (Start), Murchison Falls NP, Kibale Forest NP (Chimps), Queen Elizabeth NP, Bwindi Impenetrable NP (Gorillas), Entebbe (End)
